title: where the fuck are the gamemodes anymore?

replies.body:
they are on their way, there was no way they were going to waste their own time bringing them out during the last few months of ranked. 

pretty sure next patch will have a new game mode
they should have done it a long time ago too like wtf
how they only do it after every patch. this is the first patch since ranked has finished
I never see the gamemodes after every patch
